text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's already this bright! Sorry,<n>Mom, I'll head out to the
fields right<n>'way!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait a sec... this is...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: G-good morning.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Aaah?! An Umamusume! Wait, I<n>mean... Suzuka?! Huh? Um,
I... What?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Oh, that's right! Yesterday, I arrived<n>in Tokyo! Then I met
Suzuka and we<n>ran together! And after that...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
After that... I was totally shocked at<n>how big the academy
is... then I got all<n>dizzy.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, Suzuka. Just wondering, but... I<n>totally caused you a
ton of trouble,<n>didn't I?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Not really... I heard from the dorm<n>leader Fuji that you're
my new<n>roommate, so I figured I'd just carry<n>you back
with me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You carried me back?! Aaaahhhh! I'm<n>sorry—so, so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but you said we're roommates?!<n>That makes me so
happy! ...But I feel<n>super sorry too! Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: U-um... are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Yeah. I feel much better after<n>washing my face!
Sorry I made such a<n>racket earlier, hehe...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But can you blame me? Tracen<n>Academy is seriously
amazing! I<n>mean, even the dorm's washrooms<n>are
ginormous!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes, well, there are two dorms, Ritto<n>and Miho, both of which
are divided<n>into several buildings.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Still, there really are a lot of students.<n>If we didn't have this
much room, we<n>would probably all be squished<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I see! ...Ah, are those bottles over<n>there all tail-care
products? There's<n>so many!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Exactly who is making all this noise<n>this early in the—Huh?
Haven't seen<n>you around before.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ack, sorry! I-I'm Special Week—I just<n>transferred here
yesterday!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Ah, so you're the one... I'm Air<n>Groove, the vice president
of the<n>student council. I heard you collapsed<n>earlier. Are
you all right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-I'm f-f-fine! Your Excellency!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I'm only a vice president.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um. Special Week, it's okay. She's<n>actually not that scary.
Despite how<n>she appears...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That's the most reassuring<n>description you can muster?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, forget it. In any case, you might<n>want to check out a
mirror, Special<n>Week. Your tail is still a mess.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It is?! S-sorry, Your Grace!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I told you, I'm just the vice<n>president... Honestly.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
...Suzuka, can I ask you to give her a<n>tour of the place? After
that, show her<n>to the student council office. The<n>president
will be waiting there.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, sure... I can do that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I know it's a lot of walking around,<n>but your leg is okay
now, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh yeah, it's completely fine.<n>I've even started
training again.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Is that so? How about registering for<n>a scrimmage, then? I
remember<n>seeing quite a few that lined up well<n>with your
recovery.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hm... Um, about that...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Waaah! Wh-what?! What, what?!<n>Sorry, does anyone know
how to stop<n>the dryer?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Sorry... I should go and help Special<n>Week.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Understood.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Okay, as for our tour... this is the<n>cafeteria here. They serve
breakfast<n>and dinner every day, which includes<n>days off
like today...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Urk. Sorry, I know you're in the<n>middle of explaining
everything. But I<n>missed dinner yesterday and can't<n>bear
the hunger anymore...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh... Hehe... Hehehe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: S-Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Ah, s-sorry. It's just... your belly<n>gave you away. I can't...
Hehehe.<n>Hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haaah... Um... First off, let's grab<n>something to eat, then.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Okaaay...
